revised_title: Discovery of an Ancient Woman and Her Sandals in a Morass in the Isle of Axholm
tldr: A laborer discovers a well-preserved woman's body and a pair of ancient sandals in a Lincolnshire morass. The body and sandals are examined, revealing the sandals to be made of tanned leather and possibly dating back to a pre-Edward IV era. The discovery raises questions about the woman's identity and the history of footwear in England.
